original_title: Stradivarius: Mysteries Of The Supreme Violin
overview: Around 600 Stradivarius-made violins still exist, but the secret of its unrivaled sound remains veiled in mystery. Join Karen Gomyo, a New York-based Stradivarius player, and performers, artisans, and scientists on a 300-year journey tracing the saga of this sublime instrument.
title: Stradivarius: Mysteries Of The Supreme Violin
